website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive but capable way to improve air quality and cut down on dust.
pros: Unit is small, light, and easy to carry
Able to spray continuously for 4.5 hours or intermittently for 9, upon which the automatic shutoff is engaged
Operates under 35dB, so it’s a great fit for offices and bedrooms as well as cars
Features 7 LED light colors and one-button operation
cons: This unit isn’t as sturdy and durable as some of the alternatives

customer_reviews.title: Great water steam dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Great product look at the video I posted to see if that's what you need. It's a great steam sent dispancer
customer_reviews.author: Aceking

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT,it’s awesome it makes my car breathable and calming would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Between the dry winter air and the blasting heat in my car, my airway was getting very dry and irritated. This has really helped! It's small and fits right in the cup holder, and it puts out a good amount of steam. You have the option of turning on the color changing light or not, as well as setting it on one solid color. My kids enjoy the light!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been sick for the past week and have been very congested. My doctor recommended that I use a humidifier to help with the congestion so I found this product and decided to give it a try. The humidifier is small and compact, perfect for my computer desk. I got this on Saturday and used it everyday since. It’s easy to use and definitely helped with my stuffy nose. Would definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! ! This humidifier is especially good to operate, and after plugging in the power, the entire house can be kept moist with just one button press. And this machine has a light function, transforming a lot of colors, very nice! Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and low noise
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful with the mist could reach 1 feet high. I add few drops of tea tree oil and it smells good. Pretty portable, won't leak while I put it in my backpack with water filled. Bonus filter stick included.
customer_reviews.author: HAN SOLO

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend who is a truck driver. The heat in his truck makes it sooooo dry you feel like your nose is going to bleed! Since he started using it, his drives are more comfortable and he sleeps better in his bunk at night! He says he highly recommends it!
customer_reviews.author: MissAlessa

customer_reviews.title: Works with essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted an essential oil diffuser for my vehicle. It really works!! The usb plugs into the usb hub in my car and when filled with water and essential oil drops, it sets to work within seconds! It’s the perfect size and easily fits into my cup holder. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GFamily6

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel humidifier. It’s easy to use, fits in multiple spots in my car and eases the sinus pain I get from dry air. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dunning

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE ESSENTIAL OILS
customer_reviews.text: The directions do not specify how to turn on the LED, I had to come back to the Amazon description to find out. Long press the power button to turn it on and it will cycle through the 7 colors. If you prefer a certain color, when the cycle gets to it, long press the power button again and it will stay on that color until you turn it off. This thing is awesome and puts out a lot of moisture. I use it in a pinch at home when I'm super congested and it does the trick. DO NOT USE ESSENTIAL OILS. It will ruin the filter and possibly the atomizer. I freakin love this thing. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Poodle

customer_reviews.title: It DOES have a filter!
customer_reviews.text: Stated it did not use a filter, and yet it has a filter. Works fine, but is not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: NurseKristen

customer_reviews.title: great for the car
customer_reviews.text: we got this for long road trips, our daughter gets really stuffy and we thought this might help. we havent taken a long road trip yet, but we tested it out on shorter trips and it works perfectly. plugs into usb, fits in a cup holder and puts out a good bit of mist! it ran for a few hours on the little bit of water it holds. also doesnt spill, hubby filled it and brought it to the car upside down, and, its still put out mist!!
customer_reviews.author: TrishaChristine

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a diffuser for essential oils
customer_reviews.text: The ad for this gizmo made me believe it was a essential oil diffuser. It is only a heavy water mist sprayer humidifer and not good at that. It does not disperse essential oil properly and it leaves moisture around it on the countertop. It has a filter and one extra for, I guess, when the filter blocks up. I threw mine away. It is a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable
customer_reviews.text: The vapourization is good. I like the color transitions that happen with the lights - looks very cool on the desk. The vapor can sometimes have a burnt smell - only noticeable if you directly sniff the vapor. One filling of water seems to last about 5 hours. The auto switch-off can be annoying at times if you want it running all the time. Would've been better if it had the ability to diffuse essential oils. This is only good for small areas and for intermediate durations like a desk or a car. Get a larger one for prolonged operation and/or if you want essential oils to be diffused.
customer_reviews.author: Aneesh MG

customer_reviews.title: On for 8 hours, great price, good gift, LED light show, low battery usage
customer_reviews.text: It fits in my cup holder, I can use it at the office, I can hold down the button and watch the LED show, and I can let it run for 8 hours with the water reserve it has. This thing has been working non-stop since I got it about three weeks ago. $15 is really good. It has simple parts but it really delivers. I would buy it as a gift and I would buy it for others. It doesn't use more battery than your phone does.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer from SLC,UT

customer_reviews.title: Omg I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I drive taxi... imagine hot air blowing on you for 16-18 hours a day... everyday. This thing has been a savior to my skin and sinuses!. Nice fine mist. Does NOT fog the windows with normal use in my Prius. It’s been a game changer just in the few days I’ve had it. You do need to descale it regularly if you run it as much as I have been, and “just use tap water” as is recommended in the literature (we have very hard water) . Bought a second one so I can clean one while using the other. It does come with a second wick, but haven’t figured out how to or needed to change one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Teddytedra

customer_reviews.title: Love that it uses USB!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser works excellent! I love that it uses USB! I can take it just about anywhere and use it! Be careful with how many drops of oil you use it you can stop up the filter. You only need a couple drops! If you get too much just rinse the filter with water. (Learned the hard way). Other than my own error it's been great!
customer_reviews.author: KarDMom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one nights use.
customer_reviews.text: This product I was excited about because it’s portable so I could use on my nightstand at night while getting rest, and take with me to my car. Cool light colors, disperses nicely but noticed it bubbling and seems like a clogged pore in drain, easy to use function one button. but after one overnight’s use, I woke up and it no longer worked, also the cord plugin to the unit became loose. Disappointed, now it’s a useless product I spent money on. Sadly.
customer_reviews.author: mmk

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Poor quality, relies on special filters
customer_reviews.text: 1. You must replace filters for it to work. Filters used are special and not available pretty much anywhere. 2. You cannot use any aroma products or it will clog up and die quickly. As this is the primary use of most car "humidifiers", this is a dumb limitation for the product. Ship this one back to China...
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H Gellenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Great little humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great, it fits perfect in the cup holder. It’s great quality, has a nice size tank with a good strong cool mist. I always feel like I can’t breathe with the heat on in my van but this makes it so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Avila-Jungjohann

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier !!
customer_reviews.text: I use it during sleeping in our bedroom since I can’t use big humidifier because of my husband’s condition . The cool mist it brings out is perfect to keep me from getting congested . The container is made of good material that is hard to slip off From your hand . I love the mode of continuous and non continuous . It does last 4-8 hours depending on your setting and don’t get hot . I’m happy I bought this .Thanks and receive the product on specified date .
customer_reviews.author: vie shela van dyke

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Functional
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has severe asthma & has been hit with croup a few times this season. We spend hours in the car everyday- including a school car line which turns into nap time for my 3 yr old. This humidifier has helped so much! She can sleep while breathing in moist air. Easy to set up, figure out, & get working. Sleek style & fits into cup holder. It’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: EAshleyS

customer_reviews.title: It is very water messy. Leaves puddles.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. It is easy to use but it is messy. It leaves water puddles on the the surface of the device and on the surface it is sitting onI let it run overnight on my bedside table and there was a huge water puddle traveling to my alarm clock!!
customer_reviews.author: The Larsen

customer_reviews.title: No longer working
customer_reviews.text: Have had about a week was working fine now where the mist comes out keep bubbling and over flowing with water. The tank is not past max fill line. Will not work now only after using one week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, this was awesome for a few weeks and now... nothing. Not emitting anything at all. I used to have to refill this half way through my 8 hour work day and now it only uses about a quarter of one fill of water. Not sure what happened... disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the unit works, as in it produces mist, but it came in probably damaged and slowly disintegrating. The information says there is an LED light, the unit I received does not have any LED lights. After 2 days of usage, a rubber washer from the unit fell off and replacing it seems impossible. I would be surprised if this unit lasts for more than a couple months. I will try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier! It fits perfectly in the cup holder in my car and also works great on the desk in my office
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very dry state which is difficult when you have allergies. This easily plugs into to car’s USB port. It uses very little water and is easy to fill. It emits a light mist and even has the capacity to change colors. This has been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car Humidifier that does just what it says ..
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought and used this briefly before giving it to my bestie. I enjoyed being able to control the mist and the changing colors. It fit in my car cup holder. I also added essential oils to the water before use. Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ritzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to My gf. She uses it in her car now that she's a new mom
customer_reviews.author: Lovelybabe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the only issue I have is the rubber ring on the inside will swell up and fall out. If you take the ring out in-between uses it shrinks back to the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Randel

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to use. I just filled it with water and plugged it into my computer! Mist is strong and doesn’t leave condensation on my keyboard or monitors, which my last humidifier did. Since it is so small and compact, I think it will be great for travel also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Misty euphoria
customer_reviews.text: Mist for days! This mist is so powerful it goes up the dashboard towards the vents. Also has a very cool light feature that cycles as you use it. Has two modes on it for misting and steady flow
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Make sure it's close to you or it doesn't make much of a difference tho
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Mostly powered by wishful thinking.
customer_reviews.text: It basically whicks moisture into the air with heat to induce evap. The "whick" is basically foam and is disposable as it can collect mildew and can't release it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay long
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly, till today. It quits without any notice, or "syndrome", or any reason. If you're satisfied with its 5 months life. There should be no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Xin

customer_reviews.title: Great product save life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car humidifier for my friend, she love it and it’s so cute. Make you feel relax when you drive. Especially when you turn the heat on in the winter, it will save your skin. I would recommend to buy it. The water won’t come out when you driving.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana99

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my desk at work or on the go In the car! The colors are cute but most importantly it does its job. One fill and it lasted most of the work day!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Puts out good mist
customer_reviews.text: Nice little diffuser. Really puts out. Fits in my cup holder nicely. Which it didn't have that annoying filter stick but it's still nice!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This only worked for a month. Now it's not working at all. Don't buy this. Businesses shouldn't be allowed to sell poor products in this country anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Moss

customer_reviews.title: now unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in August, it is now September and this item no longer works... I am very unhappy...I never added any oils or anything...
customer_reviews.author: thy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a week then not so much...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a couple weeks and it isn't working. At first it was great, I like it's compact size and it gave out the proper amount of moisture but this past week the vapor stream is practically insignificant. I've changed the filter and cleaned the top but it hasn't made a difference. I'm returning this for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Spaeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This got here faster then expected. I live this diffuser it’s perfect for your car. I will be buying and extra 3 for my other cars.
customer_reviews.author: daioni

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient. Summer is coming, when driving the car, I can easily use it to make myself comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Decent little humidifier, although the capacity is pretty small.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a tiny humidifier for a car or office -- this little thing might just do the trick for you, although the capacity is quite small, it's perfect for smaller spaces. I got this as a way to keep my car fresh, and it works great for that purpose -- the USB power supply works fine with my car's accessory outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Christan

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and a pretty powerful humidifier. I like it's compact design and ordered it because of that. The USB makes it portable and easy to use in the car or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little device really put out some moisture. Fill with water, plug in and go. Fits right in the cup holder and has cool, soft, blue accent lights.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Returning
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier only worked for a few minutes then shut off and it wouldn’t turn back on no matter how many times I unplugged/rep lugged it in and pressed the button. I am so bummed because it’s so cute! I wish it had worked. Will be returning and on to search for one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Too loud but over all good product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like about it is that I can hear the mist coming out. Even with the radio on I can hear it. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Marint1699

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Is so much nicer and easier than i thought it was going to be. Came in the mail super fast with prime shipping, and the setup process was more than easy!! I mainly bought this to use in my car and it works so well I was in such shock when i first put it in my car, it puts out more than enough smoke which was also surprising. Definitely would recommend to anyone who is interested in getting one!
customer_reviews.author: Riley Waites

customer_reviews.title: Controlling humidity!!
customer_reviews.text: Item is really good !! It helps to control humidity on my car !! But after one day used the cap ( top portion where smoke comes out ) is pop off and stopped working but item still turn on ! I think it’s manufacture defect! I really appreciate to seller ! I am gonna buy another one from same seller!! I am gonna give you good review even product damaged!!
customer_reviews.author: Keshav Royal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is awesome. Absolutely no noise, choice of changing lights or no lights for sleep. Haven't needed to use my dry mouth spray at night.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Its the Little Things in Life that make it Worth While
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how quickly my little pocket humidifier came in the mail. Perfect timing due to all the smoke in the air from the surrounding forest fires... this little humidifier Definitely helped me. Perfect for holding; desk in office, nightstand, car Rides or during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Very very tiny and easy to use definitely for a car not for plants in a room or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: With it being winter I set this next to my baby's crib at night and I can't tell a huge difference in his sleeping! I'm very impressed with how great this little thing works!! I'm going to order another one for my car!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Dead in a day
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this has such high reviews, this thing stopped working after about a total of 4 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Madden

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend buying this item because it is a marriage and not a must-sell for people
customer_reviews.text: The second time I buy this product from this seller, it has never sent me a quality product. The device does not work well and after 1 hour of work I stop doing it. I do not recommend buying this item because it is a marriage and not a must-sell for people
customer_reviews.author: iurii Demianchuk

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This product has a cotton(?) filter that does not work well with essential oils. Don't by this if you are looking for an oil diffuser. It is a great, quiet humidifier for a small space like a desk or car.
customer_reviews.author: tarit

customer_reviews.title: Eases Brad
customer_reviews.text: I drive a semi truck all over the US. Constant weather and temperature changes almost daily. The cab air gets soo dry. I can keep some moisture in the air. Convenient and so easy to use. Really helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect size for travel and having a night light is a bonus! It works great and this is my 3rd purchase in 3 months. Ordered one for a friend who drives trucks and it was an asset to his lifestyle! Great purchase! My only drawback is that I wish it wasn't USB charge only. It would be nice to have an AC adapter as well.
customer_reviews.author: LaKesha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not working any more
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color, and it's been worked well. But It's broken after using 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Eunji Jeon

customer_reviews.title: Broke Right Away
customer_reviews.text: Worked great... for the first week until it broke. Materials feel very cheap. No real way to troubleshoot. Immerse because size and design was nice.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Worked so well until it didnt
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at my desk for about a month and then it just cut out and wont work. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jason Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This little thing does work! Works way better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Cody Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little humidifier, and it shuts off when it is out of water. Love that it is easy to turn off colored lights at the top of the humidify. Carry it with me on trips to humidify the room also have it in my bedroom or desk now that it is almost winter! Made well.
customer_reviews.author: C Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: When i used this item it had a burnt smell. For the price the item is great. You only get a light smell of the oils when adding to this humidifier. Save your money and get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Soda can size!
customer_reviews.text: For reference the item is the size of a soda can. The product works as described though it does leak it it is tilted. There is no gasket to make it spill proof. I use it in my GMC Acadia and it really doesn't humidify that size vehicle. I believe it would be fine for a small car.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fores

customer_reviews.title: Breathing Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this humidifier in my office and when I travel. It's perfect for small spaces and even hotel rooms. Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Am surprised at this damage after three usage. Please can someone get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Toks

customer_reviews.title: Short term solution
customer_reviews.text: For the first month, this product is perfect. Exactly what you need. But this is the second one of these travel humidifiers I’ve bought, and this is the second time it has stopped working with no explanation. You can hear mist trying to sputter out, but no go. Poor quality and very disappointing. Again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A clean smelling car
customer_reviews.text: Got in my Jeep just perfect. Keeps it fresh with clean air. Easy to use with wick. Simple to clean just wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Great for small areas!
customer_reviews.text: Great for desk at the office, helps increase humidity, nice compact size with alternating colors.
customer_reviews.author: kimba1140

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Car
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, but Abit of a pain to refill compared to other I have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great in certain settings
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice, small and portable, easy to refill. Cons: this works without any issue in my bedroom. But when I take it to the work office, it pools up at the top like in the picture each time. Rendering it useless because it blocks it the exit hole of the humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Vu H.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely awesome for my desk at work. Our office is very dry and this helps a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for car. The amount of light it gives off is perfect. Very easy to use just hit the button ........ and then it stopped working!!!! I literally wasted my money. Not expensive but I only used it 8 times in 4 days for really short periods. I had purchased because my drive to work is 35min and in that time my nose gets super dry. So... not worth purchasing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Genoveva solis

customer_reviews.title: perfect office humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my office desk. its tiny size looks like a cup but fits very well on desk space. one full container last long about 2 hours too!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works in cars and rooms
customer_reviews.text: (All 5 star reviews) Because it does what it’s supposed to do. It does use a filter just so u know. The water tank lasts a while too. I’ve used it in the car and my dorm. It definitely makes the air of a (small dorm) room noticeably more comfortable and works even better in the car as I’m a deliver driver.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Krawczynski

customer_reviews.title: Aroma’s doesn’t work in it at all.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work properly, just bought it and returning it immediately. Not a great defuser at all. I putted many drops of aroma in it but cant smell nothing. Make noise than 30db.
customer_reviews.author: Ibra888

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my car and it really works great. out of the box and running in 3 minutes. It's silent also so no real noise just a steady stream of cool moist air. It also has a neat intermittent feature that intermittently pushes out cool steam. This would make a great gift also.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Never knew they made these.
customer_reviews.text: Been having sinus problems for years. Moved to Colorado from Illinois. I spend a lot of time travelling and working out of my vehicle. This has helped a ton.
customer_reviews.author: RPnak

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but wayyy smaller than I expected, I have to return
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, works great, easy to us and humidifies as long as stated it would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and it last several days with a full tank on the intermittent mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: With our humidifier running our daughters room is still a little too dry for her. This was the perfect fix. It gives her the little bit of extra humidity she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Trenary

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a month right when I initially got it and as fall starts I want to use it again but the button is broken already so it won't stay on. It was sitting in my locker for 6 months, not dropped or anything. So that's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: veg4life9932

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I had used this one time. We went on a trip so we used it in the car when we first turned it on it was working. The next time I went to use it, it would not turn back on. I had doubled checked everything. Water level, plugs etc. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: The Kurtz Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! It advertises as an aroma diffuser but the products instructions say do not use aromas in it! Randomly works and then randomly doesnt work. Dont buy
customer_reviews.author: katie blackstock

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I can take this anywhere! from my house, to the car, then to work, amazing product, works as advertised, and perks that it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Felipe T.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It works great, fits in the cup holder and holds more water than other brands. My car stays warmer and I don’t have to worry about being shocked every time I get out of the car in winter.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiJanelle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until it stopped working yesterday and got really hot.....bought Aug 8th and stopped wotking Sept 24th....ugggg!!!

customer_reviews.title: So cute!

customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is small but perfect for me since I’m using it at my work desk. Can even work as a diffuser if you add a couple essential oil drops. It’s sleek and adorable too.

product_meta.title: Epoch Making USB Car Humidifier, 200 Milliliter Mini Portable Humidifiers Air Purifier with 7 Colors LED Night Light, Quiet Operation, Adjustable Mist Modes for Travel Home Baby Office Car (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackCompact and portable desktop humidifierNano technology will atomize the water into micron water molecules, clean water molecules and fine mist, which is easier to spread and be absorbed by your skin. There is no heat in the ultrasonic super-fine mist, so you don't have to worry about burns. Characterized by silent humidification and no radiation, it can be used by pregnant women, the elderly and children. Because it diffuses water by ultrasonic vibration, it can quickly and effectively humidify the inner side of itself and the interior of the car. Spray mode description: 1. Press the function button to turn on the continuous spray mode: Spraying continuously Full water can be used for total 9 hours (automatic stop after 4. 5 hours of continuous operation) 2. Press again to turn on the intermittent spray mode: Spray for 3 seconds and stop for 3 seconds Full water can be used for total 16 hours (automatic stop after 9 hours of continuous operation) Sufficient humidification can keep moisture at any time The large outdoor spray volume is about 35 ml / hour. With enough fog to humidify Clean the air to prevent static electricity It can prevent dust from splashing and relieve the drying of the nose and throat. Perfect beauty effect. Suitable for offices, rooms, cars, yoga and other places. Note: As a humidifier, its material and structure are not suitable to be used as an aromatherapy. If you add essential oil, it may decrease the service life of the product. The water injected into the humidifier should be tap water, because after the evaporation of distilled water and the extraction of purified water, their original water quality will be chan
feature_bullets: [Portable desktop humidifier] This mini car humidifier is small and light which is easy to carry. It is suitable in bedrooms, offices, living rooms, cars and travelling. Two colors of black and white will satisfy most of the users.

[Silent operation/USB power] With sound-free design, it only creates sound less than 35 dB which is very quiet, giving you a perfect sleep. You can even use it with children and pets at home. With the USB power port, you can charge it with computers and mobile phone.

[7 colors LED night light/car humidifier] 7 colors LED night light will give you more choice to find your favorite color. Just plug it into the car's USB port, it can purify the air inside the car and prevent static electricity and dust, reliving dry nose and throat. You can take it for business trips and travels.

[One button for all controls] Spray: single click the function button to spray continuously for 4. 5 hours; double click the function button to spray for 9 hours at intervals (3s). Night light: press and hold the function button for 1. 5 seconds to turn on the 7 colors night light mode; press and hold the button for another 1. 5 seconds to fix the light; press and hold for 1. 5 seconds again to turn off the night light mode. You can choose the color and environment you like in this way.

[Two mode/intelligent power off] 200 ml of water can be used for about 9 hours in a continuous spray mode (automatically stopped after 4. 5 hours) and about 16 hours in the interval spray mode (automatic stop after 9 hours of continuous operation). With intelligent anti-dry function, if there is insufficient water after continuously running for 4 hours, it will stop automatically, so you won’t be disturbed while sleeping. The quality assurance within 6 months from the date of purchase is attached
